findings.title: A.2: Ownership Transfer should be a Two-way Process
findings.description: Ownership transfer process should be two-way to ensure secure and reliable ownership management.

findings.title: A.5: Floating Solidity Version (pragma solidity ^0.8.7)
findings.description: The smart contract uses a floating solidity version (^0.8.7) which can lead to unexpected behavior and security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Public Functions could be Declared as External in Order to Save Gas
findings.description: Declaring public functions as external can help save gas.

findings.title: A.7: Non-usage of specific imports (Gas)
findings.description: Unused specific imports can lead to unnecessary gas consumption.
